data.lyric:
[ti:Old Boy (《老男孩》电视剧同名主题曲)]
[ar:古巨基]
[al:Old Boy]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Old Boy - 古巨基 (Leo Ku)
[00:02.10]词：黄星瑞
[00:04.21]曲：谭旋
[00:06.31]编曲：陈思同
[00:08.42]弦乐：国际首席爱乐乐团
[00:10.53]录音：马涛
[00:12.63]混音：马涛
[00:14.74]和声：曾缔
[00:16.84]制作人：谭旋
[00:18.95]出品：上海谭旋音乐工作室
[00:21.06]Remember when I was younger
[00:24.26]
[00:25.20]Thinking 'bout all the fancy things
[00:28.38]
[00:29.17]Dreaming 'bout what I'll become
[00:32.06]And all my foolish fantasies
[00:35.73]Now that I look back
[00:37.90]They seem to me so funny
[00:41.98]
[00:44.13]But every time
[00:46.07]
[00:46.92]I close my eyes
[00:50.13]
[00:53.31]I wanna run away
[00:55.75]
[00:57.28]Wanna go back to that place
[01:01.33]
[01:01.95]Where we can share our feelings
[01:05.68]
[01:08.00]I think I still got
[01:10.44]A place for
[01:11.22]All my dreams and fantasies
[01:14.71]
[01:16.67]Even though I may be
[01:19.17]Too late for anything
[01:22.13]
[01:23.78]Wanna chase my dreams
[01:25.72]All the fancy things
[01:27.66]Still got passion in my bloodstream
[01:31.75]Hope I'm not too late
[01:33.68]Wanna make a change
[01:35.58]Don't want to waste my life away
[01:39.72]Wanna chase my dreams
[01:41.62]All the fancy things
[01:43.70]Life is filled with surprise
[01:47.62]
[01:48.66]I just wanna do the things I like
[01:54.09]
[02:13.41]I wanna run away
[02:16.01]
[02:17.11]Wanna go back to that place
[02:21.18]
[02:22.01]Where we can share our feelings
[02:25.67]

[02:29.99]

[02:34.80]

[02:59.81]Wanna chase my dreams

[03:07.48]
